languages.text: "Казалось бы, что общего у ксеносов и имперских фанатиков-святош? Ответ прост — и те и другие готовы жертвовать миллиардами подданных Империума". {n}Мрачная ухмылка совсем не красит лицо Джай.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Казалось бы, что общего у ксеносов и имперских фанатиков-святош? Ответ прост — и те и другие готовы жертвовать миллиардами подданных Империума". {n}Мрачная ухмылка совсем не красит лицо Джай.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "What do the xenos and the fanatical zealots of the Imperium have in common? The answer is simple — both are willing to sacrifice billions of their subjects." {n}The sullen grin that follows does not become Jae's face at all.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Казалось бы, что общего у ксеносов и имперских фанатиков-святош? Ответ прост — и те и другие готовы жертвовать миллиардами подданных Империума". {n}Мрачная ухмылка совсем не красит лицо Джай.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "What do the xenos and the fanatical zealots of the Imperium have in common? The answer is simple — both are willing to sacrifice billions of their subjects." {n}The sullen grin that follows does not become Jae's face at all.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "What do the xenos and the fanatical zealots of the Imperium have in common? The answer is simple — both are willing to sacrifice billions of their subjects." {n}The sullen grin that follows does not become Jae's face at all.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «¿Qué tienen en común los xenos y los fanáticos del Imperium? La respuesta es sencilla: ninguno de los dos tiene reparos en sacrificar a miles de millones de sus súbditos». {n}Jae esboza una sonrisa macabra nada acorde con su personalidad.{/n}
languages.original_text: "What do the xenos and the fanatical zealots of the Imperium have in common? The answer is simple — both are willing to sacrifice billions of their subjects." {n}The sullen grin that follows does not become Jae's face at all.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¿Qué tienen en común los xenos y los fanáticos del Imperium? La respuesta es sencilla: ninguno de los dos tiene reparos en sacrificar a miles de millones de sus súbditos». {n}Jae esboza una sonrisa macabra que no va con ella.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “异形和帝国的狂热分子有什么共同之处？答案很简单，就是两者都愿意随意牺牲掉自己数十亿的臣民。”{n}婕伊脸上露出了阴沉的笑容，看起来和平时不太一样。{/n}
languages.original_text: "What do the xenos and the fanatical zealots of the Imperium have in common? The answer is simple — both are willing to sacrifice billions of their subjects." {n}The sullen grin that follows does not become Jae's face at all.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “异形和帝国的狂热分子有什么共同之处？答案很简单，就是两者都愿意随意牺牲自己数十亿臣民。”{n}婕伊脸上露出了阴沉的笑容，看起来和平时不太一样。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Quel est le point commun entre les xénos et les fanatiques de l'Imperium ? C'est simple : ils sont tous prêts à sacrifier des milliards de leurs semblables, » {n}dit Jae avec un sourire morose qui ne sied pas du tout à son visage.{/n}
languages.original_text: "What do the xenos and the fanatical zealots of the Imperium have in common? The answer is simple — both are willing to sacrifice billions of their subjects." {n}The sullen grin that follows does not become Jae's face at all.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Quel est le point commun entre les xénos et les fanatiques de l'Imperium ? C'est simple : ils sont tous prêts à sacrifier des milliards de leurs semblables, » {n}dit Jae avec un sourire morose qui ne sied pas du tout à son visage.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「異種族と帝国の狂信者の共通点は何だと思う？答えは簡単。どちらも何十億もの臣民を犠牲にすることを厭わないってこと」{n}ジェイは不自然に不機嫌そうな笑みを浮かべながら言う。{/n}
languages.original_text: "What do the xenos and the fanatical zealots of the Imperium have in common? The answer is simple — both are willing to sacrifice billions of their subjects." {n}The sullen grin that follows does not become Jae's face at all.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「異種族と帝国の狂信者の共通点は何だと思う？答えは簡単。どちらも何十億もの臣民を犠牲にすることを厭わないってこと」{n}ジェイは不自然に不機嫌そうな笑みを浮かべながら言う。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Was haben die Xenos und die Fanatiker des Imperiums gemeinsam? Die Antwort ist simpel: Beide sind bereit, Milliarden ihrer Untertanen zu opfern." {n}Das mürrische Lächeln, das darauf folgt, steht Jae nicht.{/n}
languages.original_text: "What do the xenos and the fanatical zealots of the Imperium have in common? The answer is simple — both are willing to sacrifice billions of their subjects." {n}The sullen grin that follows does not become Jae's face at all.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Was haben die Xenos und die Fanatiker des Imperiums gemeinsam? Die Antwort ist simpel: Beide sind bereit, Milliarden ihrer Untertanen zu opfern." {n}Ein mürrisches Lächeln steht Jae nicht.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Zenolarla İmparatorluk bağnazlarının ortak yanı nedir? Cevap gayet basit: Her ikisi de tebaasındaki milyarlarca canı feda etmeye hazırdır." {n}Ardından gelen kasvetli sırıtış, Jae'ın yüzüne hiç yakışmıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "What do the xenos and the fanatical zealots of the Imperium have in common? The answer is simple — both are willing to sacrifice billions of their subjects." {n}The sullen grin that follows does not become Jae's face at all.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Zenolarla İmparatorluk bağnazlarının ortak yanı nedir? Cevap gayet basit: Her ikisi de tebaasındaki milyarlarca canı feda etmeye hazırdır." {n}Ardından gelen kasvetli sırıtış, Jae'ın yüzüne ait değil gibi duruyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
